author: Matthew Impelli
title: D.C. Mayor Plans to Hire Hundreds For Coronavirus Contact Tracing Force to Help Contain Outbreak
description: Contact tracing has helped other countries like China and South Korea slow the transmission of the virus and ease lockdown measures, and some health experts believe that the only way to reopen the U.S. is to increase contact tracing.
content:
On Thursday, D.C. Mayor Muriel Bowser announced a plan to hire hundreds of people to assist with tracing contacts of those infected with coronavirus as the city looks to reopen.
"We also know that any effective response and reopening will require widespread … [+2752 chars]
